title: Little Genie NZ products

thread.section_title: Little Genie NZ products – Happy lil mom life nz
thread.title: Little Genie NZ products

author: Happy lil mom life NZ
text:
Recently I have been in touch with Littlegenienz about working with them to review and promote their products and they sent me an amazing amount to use, review, blog about, instagram about.
I was blown away with the amount that they sent me to review. Thank you guys there is a lot :)
So I’m going to write a post about what exactly was in the box that they sent me.
A packet of Little Genie Bio-Nappy pants walker 13 – 18 kg and there are 18 nappy pants. I have already used one on Xavier since the package has arrived. 1 pack of Thick Baby Wipes Fragrance Free that contain 80 thick baby wipes in the back which I have used on Xavier as well. 1 pack of Thick Baby Wipes with Fragrance that contain 80 thick baby wipes. 2 packs of Bio-Degradable Baby Wipes which contain 80 bio-degradable wipes in a pack. Bio-Nursing Pads. There are 24 nursing pads in the box. Nappy bags. There are 100 bags in the box that are split between two convenient travel packs. 200ml Baby Bubble Bath 200ml Baby Lotion 200ml Baby Bath 200ml Baby Shampoo 75ml Re Gen Oil 125ml Re Gen Cream 

Little Genie NZ or Enivrochoice was founded by two dads in 2007. They aim to provide the best for not only your child but also the environment. They use naturally derived ingreidents where is possible. They also support the Royal Forest and Bird Protection Society Of New Zealand.
You can find them on their website: www.envirochoice.co.nz  OR
On their facebook page:  www.facebook.com/LittleGenieNZ 
Tonight we will be using the bath products and the baby lotion on Xavier.
I will blog about it either tonight or tomorrow morning. Along with a separate blog about the nappy pants and the wet wipes.
-Danielle
